thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Landlord from Hastings
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Landlord from Hastings

author: Landlord from Hastings
title: Landlord from Hastings
text:
fast to book , easy to pick up, nice car ( lucky to get upgrade - not usual so nice), easy handback and on airport location. It was via Hertz,
be alert that if you book an Interrent car as we did last time they now try to charge 15 euro to clean the car! Absurd - Rentalcars please try to do something about this silly charge ( unless you bring the car back in a mess - but that was not themessage when we collected car)
